SPOT-31574C.abstract: Near real time integral wave parameters from wave buoys collected by IMOS using a SOFAR Spotter-V3 at Hillarys
SPOT-31574C.title: Near real time integral wave parameters from wave buoys collected by IMOS using a SOFAR Spotter-V3 at Hillarys
SPOT-31574C.citation: The citation to be used in publications using the dataset should follow the format: "Integrated Marine Observing System, [year-of-data-downloaded], Wave buoys Observations - Australia - near real-time, Downloaded from [url] on [date-of-download]"
